name: Spirit Stump
description:
The forest is in great danger! Are you able to help clearing it from the corruption?

You, the little stump Cru, get the power of the great tree to move freely and transform into various spirit forms which help you to reach the source of the corruption.

 

Your new skills let you reach new frontiers. Learn and master new skills such as:

A strong spirit that gives strength to overcome any obstacle!

A fast spirit to rush through the woods and jump over the widest gaps!

A light transformation, which lets you reach new heights and places!

Collect seeds to help the forest regenerate itself and continue your journey.

Can you stop the sickness of the forest and the upcoming doom from happening?

Credits

Huge thanks for Ocxiros for helping me with the music. Go check the band out!
